QuestionText: What is the primary goal of epidemiology in public health?
OptionB: To study the distribution and determinants of health-related events
OptionC: To provide medical care to individuals
CorrectAnswer: To study the distribution and determinants of health-related events

CorrectAnswer: Empowering individuals to take control of their health

QuestionText: What is the name of the framework used to analyze the causes of health inequities?
